snippet.title: Cleopatra Fortune Plus (Sega Naomi) - Story Mode, 1CC
snippet.description:
Arcade puzzle game where you have stones, mummies and treasures. Seal mummies and treasures with stones to destroy everything in sealed area but make sure you have at least one treasure inside. And create a horizontal line of stones to destroy it just like in Tetris. If you destroyed every tile in game area then you get Perfect Bonus.

Addition in Cleopatra Fortune Plus - fill up colorful gauges with different gems to make powerups appear. And then seal this powerup with stones to activate it and destroy several types of tiles, split big stones into small ones or make pieces fall with slow speed.
